cause.description:
Does anyone know why we should even listen to these fuckers like come on what good are they? The pigs are often times more corrupt than the criminals after all absolute power corrupts absolutely! What person could sit there and honestly just try to serve and protect without taking a little off the top come on we have all seen it!
1. To educate people about the crap they pull
2. Taking the power back
3. Promote truth and resposibilty
cause.mission: F them before they f you!
cause.name: F The Police
